rajawali.materials.shaders

Interface AShaderBase.IGlobalShaderVar

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AShaderBase.DefaultShaderVar, DiffuseMethod.DiffuseShaderVar, LightsVertexShaderFragment.LightsShaderVar, SkeletalAnimationMaterialPlugin.SkeletalAnimationShaderVar, SpecularMethod.SpecularShaderVar, ToonFragmentShaderFragment.ToonShaderVar, VertexAnimationMaterialPlugin.VertexAnimationShaderVar
    Enclosing class:
    AShaderBase

    public static interface AShaderBase.IGlobalShaderVar
    Shader variables map to variable names that will be used in shaders. They are defined in enums for consistency and reuse.
    Author:
    dennis.ippel
